title: Part e. [0–2]
stimulusHtml:
2 points

F 1 =mgsinθ+m a max sin πt T  (0<t<T)

F 2 =mgsinθ+m a max e −πt/2T

For a graph labeled F1:

1 point: for starting at mg sin θ

1 point: for half a sine wave with a maximum at ∼ T / 2

1 point: for returning to original starting point at t = T

1 point: For a horizontal line at the original starting point for t > T

For a graph labeled F2:

1 point: for starting on the vertical axis at a point above the starting point of F1 (if there is no F1 graph, this point was awarded if the F2 graph starts above mg sin θ )

1 point: For an exponential decay graph
